title: 'Good product'
body: 'Good product comfortable to sit and sleep easy to move around from hall to bedroom. Product matches the description. Will update long term use review'

title: 'Excellent product'
body: 'The product is excellent. However the color ordered and delivered were different. But even that color goes well with my room. No complaints  Definitely go for this product'

title: 'A good product'
body: The sofa is comfortable and good in quality but the color didn't match the image

title: 'Very comfortable and economical'
body: 'Product is amazing and flexible to use both as sofa and bed.'

title: 'Stylish'
body: 'It looks too good. Will buy 1 more of this color in future. Fabric too is great. Its Light-weight enable easy cleaning.'

title: 'Its good.'
body: 'Pros Solving the problem. Very light weight. Material cover is good.  Cons Little hard at first usage.'

title: 'Light weight sofa'
body: 'This helps in needed situation. Sofa is very light weight and easy to move. Nice product from Uberlyfe.'
